title: [Medicine] Engineers at MIT and Harvard University have designed a small tabletop device that can detect SARS-CoV-2 from a saliva sample in about an hour. The device can also be used to detect specific viral mutations linked to some of the SARS-CoV-2 variants that are now circulating.
[Epidemiology] Prophylactic Role of Ivermectin in Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 Infection Among Healthcare Workers (Published August 05, 2021)
